## Extent.Normalize method

Swaps [`XMin`](../xmin) with [`XMax`](../xmax) if [`Width`](../width) is negative and [`YMin`](../ymin) with [`YMax`](../ymax) if [`Height`](../height) is negative.

```csharp
public void Normalize()
```
